title: USFL MVP favorite Alex McGough has Stallions on verge of making championship game
description: Alex McGough is in MVP form as he leads the Birmingham Stallions to the South Division Championship against the New Orleans Breakers over the weekend.

title: Obama suggests Democrats have 'less tolerance for ideas that don't suit us' than when he was in office
description: Former President Obama took a swipe at his own party while discussing the "anti-democratic sentiment" that has emerged in the United States.

title: 'Experts' bashing conservative SCOTUS justices have undisclosed ties to Democrats
description: Legal and ethics "experts" quoted in recent articles targeting conservative justices on the Supreme Court for alleged ethics violations have connections to Democrats like President Biden and former President Bill Clinton.

title: Florida horse rescued from above-ground pool after getting spooked and jumping in
description: Florida firefighters received an unusual call to rescue a horse that accidentally jumped into an above-ground swimming pool after it was spooked by another horse.

title: Atlanta reparations task force member says country must move forward racially: 'Have to let go of the past'
description: A reparations task force member in Fulton County, Georgia, explains the panel's mission and responds to critics who say reparations are unfair and divisive.

title: Judge Judy’s court: America’s favorite judge now dominates streaming empire at 80
description: Judge Judy Sheindlin is 80 years old but showing no signs of slowing down as she expands her courtroom TV show empire into streaming.

title: The left hates parents’ groups so naturally they label these moms a ‘hate’ group
description: Parent groups focus on transparency in schools and use that transparency as a tool to ensure public education is non-political and age appropriate for their children.

title: Gov. Abbott weighs in on potential Mark Zuckerberg-Elon Musk cage match: 'Biggest fight'
description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott joined the chorus of people commenting on a potential bout between Twitter owner Elon Musk and Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg.

title: Illinois woman pleads guilty to straw purchasing gun convicted felon used to kill police officer
description: An Illinois woman pleaded guilty to federal charges stemming from the straw purchase of a gun used to shoot and kill Champaign police officer Christopher Oberheim in 2021.

title: Meet the American who was revered as the 'patron saint' until he was canceled: Lenni Lenape chief Tammany
description: Lenni Lenape chief Tamanend, better known as King Tammany, was celebrated as the "Patron Saint of America" and honored by Americans for 200 years — until he was canceled.

title: Schumer’s AI regulatory effort slows as ‘weeks’ turn into months
description: Sen. Chuck Schumer said this week that he's still months away from gathering the input he needs from experts to formulate a plan on how to regulate AI.

title: UN calls for AI watchdog agency due to 'tremendous' potential: 'very clear' urgency
description: The U.N. is working to establish an AI advisory committee, but officials within the organization have called for a watchdog group that could take action to safeguard against AI.

title: The greed of Big Pharma cannot continue
description: The greed of Big Pharma means the industry is bringing in billions of dollars, while new and existing drugs are spiking in cost. I have some ways to fix that.

title: NCAA athlete claims she was scolded by AI over message about women's sports
description: NCAA volleyball player Macy Petty says ChatGPT rewrote a message that only biological women should play on women's sports teams to be more inclusive.

title: Arizona officials identify body found in remote bonfire pit as missing 18-year-old
description: The Maricopa County Sheriff’s Office have identified the remains of a body found near the Apache Junction in Arizona as a teen who went missing earlier in the month.

title: LAURA INGRAHAM: The Bidens continue to surprise us
description: Laura Ingraham discusses more details about Hunter Biden's leisure activities and how he was allegedly a member of a private sex club on "The Ingraham Angle."

title: Kelly Clarkson says she was 'blindsided' by 'toxic' work environment allegations on her talk show
description: "The Kelly Clarkson Show" faced accusations in May of fostering a "toxic" work environment behind scenes. The NBC program is moving to New York for season 5.

title: GREG GUTFELD: AI reveals what we already knew, conservatives are happier and more attractive than liberals
description: Fox News host Greg Gutfeld reacts to a Danish study finding artificial intelligence can help predict a person’s political ideology based on their facial characteristics on "Gutfeld!"

title: On this day in history, June 23, 1948, Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas is born in Georgia
description: Clarence Thomas was born on this day in history, June 23, 1948. The future Supreme Court justice was born into extreme poverty near Savannah, Georgia.
